title: FS: t206 Lajoie w/bat Piedmont 350 PSA A $consigned
author: Kzoo

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Lajoie w/bat Piedmont 350 PSA A $consigned
posts.post_content:
Guys........For sale is my t206 Lajoie w/bat that has been slabbed PSA 'A' due to the lower left corner damage. Card has great image, color and centering, but corner appears to have been 'chewed on' by something long ago. Card displays nicely. Shipped price is $consigned to Sterling auction.

**Payment by Paypal 'gift' preferred. PM me here or email me at mattpienta at yahoo dot com with questions or to purchase. Thanks.........Matt
I think wazoo is looking for one of these, it might be worth it to send him a PM.
Hey Sean thanks for looking out for me. Beautiful card, but I'm looking for one alone the lines of two or three. Thanks though!
Guys..........I'm open to offers on this Lajoie. Thanks.........Matt
